captions.text:
You say you’re going 
to love me forever

You promised you’ll 
treat me right

I don’t know how that 
Feeling can change

It doesn’t mean anything 
if I have the world

It has to be you for me, 
you know me

If you loved me 
If you really loved me

Please think 
about it sometime

Those times when we 
were the world to each other

We were happier than ever
Please don’t leave me

I’m not ready to let you go 
Please come back to me

He says he can’t 
love any more

He can’t take it with 
his heart any more
He’s says he's sorry

I know it’s a lie 
But tears keep falling

I have to let you 
go and smile
I know this is the end

But my heart 
says it’s not okay

Can’t let you 
go like this

If you loved me 
If you really loved me

Please think 
about it sometime

Those times when we 
were the world to each other

We were happier than ever
Please don’t leave me

I’m not ready to let you go 
Please come back to me
If you loved me

If you loved me 
And if it’s a memory

Please turn 
back once

Those times we 
promised to be forever

It’s not going 
to work for me

Because I still 
remember you

I call you out again today 
Come back to me

To me who can’t 
forget you forever
If you Loved me

comments.text: what? is there no lasik eye surgery in Korea?﻿
comments.author: Sir John Michael

comments.text:
Oh yes of course i want people to be blind what kind of bullshit is that? 
Of course i'd rather everyone be able to see but that's not how things are 
or else blind people wouldn't exist. My comment wasn't even negative in the 
first place. All i said in the first place is that lasik doesn't work on 
everyone not that people shouldn't try it if they can. Bye.
comments.author: Melissa Patterson

comments.text:
+Melissa Patterson i'd rather imagine humanity as healthy with perfect eye 
sight. you can imagine whatever you want... oh yeah, and thanks for the 
compliment. i wasn't even trying to be clever. i was just making a valid 
point to counter your pointless negative comment.

some people die in car accidents too... are you going to stop driving a car?

no risk, no reward.
comments.author: Sir John Michael

comments.text:
+Sir John Michael Such sarcasm how clever. Is it that difficult to imagine 
that people can be blind in this day and age?
comments.author: Melissa Patterson

comments.text:
+Melissa Patterson thanks. i guess you're right. only 96% of patients 
achieve 20/20 vision or better according to the American Society of 
Cataract and Refractive Surgery. you wouldn't want to risk that 4% for 
perfect vision.
comments.author: Sir John Michael

comments.text: +Sir John Michael It doesn't always work.

+TinyYellowPanda  He left a keychain for her because he thinks that she 
left him because it was too heartbreaking to see him go blind, like a last 
gift. Then he left, not knowing that she still loved him and wanted him 
back. Then she finds the keychain and remembers the memories and finds that 
he left her and might never come back. Make more sense now? ;)
